content.raw:
This significantly degrades texture quality on the mud in task 2 and the grass in task 1.
If you reduce the texture image size of textures covering large areas you also need to reduce the texture size as used in the world (e.g. if you reduce the texture size from 1024^2 to 512^2 you also have to reduce the world size from e.g. 6m to 3m)
content.html: This significantly degrades texture quality on the mud in task 2 and the grass in task 1. If you reduce the texture image size of textures covering large areas you also need to reduce the texture size as used in the world (e.g. if you reduce the texture size from 1024^2 to 512^2 you also have to reduce the world size from e.g. 6m to 3m)
